arts.ttl: Sir Alex Ferguson's 'grumpy' reaction to Sir Jim Ratcliffe decision speaks volumes
arts.sum: Even Sir Alex Ferguson hasn't been able to escape Sir Jim Ratcliffe's cost-cutting at Manchester United, with the former manager seeing his £2million-a-year ambassadorial contract terminated

arts.ttl: Celtic face St Johnstone as Hearts take on Aberdeen in last four
arts.sum: Holders Celtic will face St Johnstone while Heart of Midlothian take on Aberdeen in the semi-finals of the Scottish Cup.

arts.ttl: Watch St Johnstone beat Livingston to reach cup semis
arts.sum: Watch the highlights as St Johnstone beat Livingston to reach Scottish Cup semi-finals thanks to a stunning winner from Graham Carey.

arts.ttl: St Johnstone boss relishing facing Livingston 'dark arts' - watch on BBC
arts.sum: Manager Simo Valakari says St Johnstone need to be prepared to deal with a Livingston side who use football's "dark arts" in their Scottish Cup quarter-final.

arts.ttl: Celtic face St Johnstone as Hearts take on Aberdeen in semis
arts.sum: Holders Celtic will face St Johnstone while Heart of Midlothian take on Aberdeen in the semi-finals of the Scottish Cup.

arts.ttl: Graham Carey’s stunner sends St Johnstone through to Scottish Cup semi-finals
Carey stunner puts St Johnstone through to semis
arts.sum: St Johnstone substitute Graham Carey fires a stunning winner in their Scottish Cup quarter-final away to Livingston.

arts.ttl: Sir Jim Ratcliffe reveals all about sit-down with Man United legend Sir Alex Ferguson and his 'grumpy' response to losing £2m ambassador job
arts.sum: Sir Alex Ferguson became the most high-profile victim of Sir Jim Ratcliffe's ruthless cost-cutting at Man United when the club's legendary manager lost his £2million-a-year contract.

arts.ttl: Scottish Cup draw LIVE as Rangers enter the women's draw before Celtic, Aberdeen and Hearts discover their fate
arts.sum: Fans are dreaming of watching their side lift the famous old trophy in the season showpiece later this year

arts.ttl: What Sir Alex Ferguson predicted when Man City first appointed Pep Guardiola in 2016
arts.sum: In total, Pep Guardiola has now been in charge of Manchester City for 516 matches, going well beyond his stays at both Barcelona and Bayern...
